channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Wasps nest in flower bed, 9th September
item.description:
I was sitting on the steps outside Remoli/Kaizen and noticed a lot of wasps flying about, I then saw that they were all going in and out of a hole in the ground in the flower bed where the nest must be. There are a number of restaurants here and also the children's playground close by so would be a good idea to get this removed ASAP.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Street, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Weeding needed, 9th September
item.description:

item.title: Lift & Both Escalators Out of order, 9th September
item.description:
Both escalators and the lift now not working. Making it very difficult for the old and disabled to access the shopping centre. It should never have been left to get this bad. Disgraceful.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Colebrook Street, Slade Green, London

item.title: Buckland crescent/belsize park/lancaster grove, 9th September
item.description:
Corner is gridlocked most school days, made worse due to current roadwork on avenue road. Rush hour and school entry/exit hours becomes a cacophony of car horns. Traffic should be managed at those times, or Lancaster Grove made into a one way up to crossfield rd to ease congestion
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Lancaster Grove, Belsize Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fire hazard, 9th September
